game.name: DUMPLing
game.shortDescription: DUMPLing is a fast-paced top-down survival shooter where you battle waves of dumpling-like enemies inside massive bowls of food. Master fluid combat, survive escalating chaos, and create crazy upgrade combinations to last just one more run.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DUMPLing is a fast-paced top-down survival shooter where you battle waves of dumpling-like enemies inside massive bowls of food. Master fluid combat, survive escalating chaos, and create crazy upgrade combinations to last just one more run.
